text: What's up, everybody?

- It's Pearce.
- And Meg.
We are here at Epcot.
Come with us for a special

behind the scenes
sneak peek of...

"Disney's Summer Magic Quest."
Let's go.

Hey, what's up?
I'm Matt Cornett.

- And I'm Kylee Russell.
- And we are the blue team!

- 'Ey-oh!
- ( imitating air horn )

Meg:
"Disney's Summer Magic Quest"
is a really fun time

where we get to do
all these challenges

and games
and meet awesome people.

- All these surprises happen. 
- Pearce: Ooh.

- At Epcot. At Night.
- Both: Whoo!

Matt: There's so many different
fun attractions here.

So many different
things to see,

different things we can do
around the park.

Pearce: We're going
head to head this time
with the other team.

Yeah. The four of us get
to be together this time

- which is really fun.
- It was really cool.

We're clearly
the best team here.

- Obviously.
- Even though we may

lose some challenges,
that doesn't matter.

Because we're winners
at heart.
We are winners at heart.

- Yeah!
- Here we go!
( gasping )

- Oh, that just ruined--
- It's on!
Okay, so Remy's Run.

I got to be on skates.
It was insane.

Roller skating with
the sandwich on,

it was so hard, and it fell on
the critic so many times.

Kylee was over here
being Chef Kylee.

Kylee: I made a sandwich
bigger than me.

- Yes! And...
- That's how you Magic Quest.
Whoo! And then we get to glide

on these awesome little things
through Epcot.

Riding the bike
through the parks

when there was nobody
there at night.

- It is so cool. 
- Pearce: Way longer than

- I thought it was actually. 
- Meg: Yeah.

Let's go!
I got you! I got you!

Oh! It's so exciting
being surprised by Milo.

- He was my old teammate. 
- Hey!

- Oh, my gosh!
- Milo!

Pearce:
I mean, I love Milo.

It was awesome to see him.
Totally surprised us.
I'm not competing this time,

but I will be participating
in many of the challenges.

I'm so excited.
The whole fam is here.
Let's go!

Oh, the Cosmic Kickoff.
That was a lot of fun.

Pearce: It was--
I think that was--

I feel it was my favorite game,
I have to say.

Basically, we have
to take these planets

and kick them into different
jump points.

- So crazy. So insane.
- Let's go!
Have you ever heard an echo?

Well, that was what it was like
inside the space sphere.

All I could hear was my breath
and my breathing.

What's up? It's Pearce
giving you the inside scoop.

- Get it? I bet you do.
- We were like, "Yeah, yeah.

It'll be really fun.
Space spheres."

And as soon as we got in,
we were like--

No smiling.
We are ready to win!

The amazing thing
about this quest

is it doesn't matter
who won.

It's just that
we had so much fun,
and we did it together.

- That's right!
- That was a lot of fun.

Pearce: Obviously, "Zombies"
cast members competing

against one another
is a preamble
to the big movie, so...

Yeah. And then when
you're done watching
"Disney's Summer Magic Quest,"

shortly after
will be "Zombies 3!"
Let's go!
Thanks for hanging out with us.
And don't forget to check out
"Disney's Summer Magic Quest."

- Matt: At Epcot. 
- Both: See ya!
